text:
1. Wetting the face
2. Applying shaving cream or gel
3. Holding the razor
4. Shaving in downward strokes
5. Rinsing the razor
6. Reapplying shaving cream or gel (if necessary)
7. Shaving in upward strokes (if desired)
8. Rinsing the face
9. Drying the face
10. Applying aftershave or moisturizer (optional)
